channel.title: 317 delta source how to not let "cheat clients" login to my source
channel.description:
well, theres the odd people who login with what everyone calls "cheat clients" well what they do is login and move my npcs around so they in wrong spots, plus when i go to ::ipban them it says they got ipbanned but there still on.. is there anyway to compeltely disable cheatclients? please say yes and help a fellow out :) thanks
Owner of epic scape.

item.title: 317 delta source how to not let "cheat clients" login to my source
item.dc:creator: @owner_of_epic_scape owner of epic scape
item.description:
@owner_of_epic_scape wrote:

what file am i editing for this? server.java?

item.title: 317 delta source how to not let "cheat clients" login to my source
item.dc:creator: @p00n_scape p00n scape
item.description:
@p00n_scape wrote:

i Got a Solution that MIGHT, MIGHT Work…

Make it So You neeed the Client to login your server

1,Server.CS

You porlly have
ClientRequired=0

change that to
ClientRequired=1

Read full topic
